@katelawlorchef @Ryanair Oh they acknowledge receipt. That’s the part they are good at. And then no further correspondence. Maybe they hope you forget.
@lagiacoma @Ryanair Shame. In due lingue.
@pixael_com @Ryanair @AerLingus It’s a matter of principle. I’ll donate the 50 quid when and if I get refunded.

@pixael_com @Ryanair Clearly NOT. And when you call/chat you get even more aggravated because they seem brainwashed & function like robot without a human approach. I would fly @aerlingus all the way but sometimes it’s just not possible.
I wrote a complaint to @Ryanair on 11-3-18 and still have NOT received a response about my refund. Ref 2233992. Lots of words no facts. Would appreciate a response & refund. Thanks
